results.headline: Biden and Trump win Democratic, Republican elections in some of 2024's last primary contests
results.summary: NEW YORK (AP) — President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump won Democratic and Republican primaries in a handful of states Tuesday, among some of the last contests on the 2024 primary calendar.

results.headline: FBI Taped Menendez Dining With Egyptians at Morton’s Steakhouse
results.summary: Jurors at the corruption trial of Senator Bob Menendez watched a secret FBI video recording of the New Jersey Democrat dining, laughing and pouring wine at a Washington steakhouse with his then-girlfriend and three Egyptian men.

results.authors: By Moses Mozart Dzawu and Katarina Hoije
results.headline: Senegal Raises $750 Million Eurobond as Market Uncertainty Eases
results.summary: Senegal became the fourth sub-Saharan African nation to tap the market this year, with a bond sale that shows investors are gaining confidence in its new government.

results.headline: Musk Chose Who Got Chips
results.summary: Musk empire governance, OpenAI governance, Roaring Kitty’s E*Trade account, NYSE glitches, synthetic PIK fees, Peter Orszag’s office and a violin token.

results.authors: By Gaspard Sebag and Irina Vilcu
results.headline: Feds Swoop on Bribery Scheme to Kill Interpol Red Notices
results.summary: The FBI, French and Moldovan crime agencies mounted raids on suspected members of a gang paying officials millions of dollars in bribes to block Interpol “Red Notices.”

results.authors: By Antony Sguazzin and Michael Cohen
results.headline: South African Election: Main Opposition Sees Room for Optimism on Coalition
results.summary: The leader of South Africa’s main opposition Democratic Alliance said that investor optimism about it reaching a coalition deal with the ANC to form the next government isn’t misplaced and that it is open to talks that put the country’s interests first.

results.authors: By Sabrina Willmer, Kiel Porter, and Chris Strohm
results.headline: RTX to Resolve US Probe Into Charges for Missile Contracts
results.summary: RTX Corp. is in the late stages of a deal to settle a criminal investigation by the US government into pricing for missile and defense services, according to people with knowledge of the matter.

results.headline: Spanish Judge Calls Sanchez’s Wife to Testify in Blow for PM
results.summary: A judge has summoned Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez’s wife, Begona Gomez, to testify as the target of a criminal investigation that has rocked the country for weeks.

results.headline: Angola to Lease Three Production Plants Seized From Ex-General
results.summary: Angola started a tender process for rights to operate and manage businesses it seized from former army general, Manuel Helder Vieira Dias, in 2018.

results.headline: Thaksin Will Defend His Case, Won’t Flee This Time, Thai PM Says
results.summary: Former Thai leader Thaksin Shinawatra will stay in the country to fight a royal defamation charge, Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin said on Tuesday, seeking to allay speculation that Thaksin would flee as he did 16 years ago.
